Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerForDao, IControllerForEng, IControllerForView
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerForEng, IControllerForView, IControllerForDao
The Controller class is the main controller of the application. It is responsible for controlling the engine, the UI and the DAO. The Controller class implements the IControllerForEng, IControllerForView and IControllerForDao interfaces.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(ISimulatorUI ui)
      Constructor for the Controller class.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • startSimulation

      public void startSimulation()
      Starts the simulation by initializing and configuring the engine, updating the UI and locking the interface to prevent user input during the simulation. The steps involved in starting the simulation are: 1. Creates a new engine thread for each simulation. 2. Saves a new simulation to the database. 3. Sets the simulation time to the UI. 4. Sets the delay to the UI. 5. Clears the screens of the visualizations in the UI. 6. Locks the UI to prevent user input during the simulation run time. 7. Starts the engine thread.
      Specified by:
      startSimulation in interface IControllerForView

    • slow

      public void slow()
      Slows down the engine thread by increasing the delay of the engine thread by 10%. The delay is the time between each step of the engine thread.
      Specified by:
      slow in interface IControllerForView

    • fast

      public void fast()
      Increases the speed of the engine thread by decreasing the delay of the engine thread by 10%. The delay is the time between each step of the engine thread.
      Specified by:
      fast in interface IControllerForView

    • getDelay

      public long getDelay()
      Returns the delay of the engine thread.
      Specified by:
      getDelay in interface IControllerForView
      Returns:
      The delay of the engine thread.

    • visualizeArrival

      public void visualizeArrival()
      Visualizes the arrival of a package in the UI by creating a new package in the first visualization screen.
      Specified by:
      visualizeArrival in interface IControllerForEng

    • visualizeWarehouse

      public void visualizeWarehouse()
      Visualizes the collection of the order in the UI by moving the package from the first visualization screen to the second visualization screen.
      Specified by:
      visualizeWarehouse in interface IControllerForEng

    • visualizePacking

    • visualizeShipping

      Specified by:
      visualizeShipping in interface IControllerForEng

    • visualizeClear

      public void visualizeClear()
      Visualizes the pickup of a package in the UI by removing the packages from the fourth visualization screen.
      Specified by:
      visualizeClear in interface IControllerForEng

    • showProgress

      public void showProgress()
      Shows the progress of the simulation in the UI by updating the progress bar. 1. Calculates the maximum time of the simulation. 2. Calculates the current time of the simulation by using the Clock class to get the time. 3. Sets the progress of the simulation to the UI by dividing the current time by the maximum time of the simulation.
      Specified by:
      showProgress in interface IControllerForEng

    • resetTime

      public void resetTime()
      Resets clock's time to 0
      Specified by:
      resetTime in interface IControllerForEng

    • resetSimulation

      public void resetSimulation()
      Resets simulation for a new run.
      Specified by:
      resetSimulation in interface IControllerForEng

    • save

      public <T> T save(T entity)
      Saves an entity to the database. 1. If the entity is a simulation, saves the simulation to the database. 2. If the entity is an order, saves the order to the database. The method is called when a new simulation is started or when a new order is created.
      Specified by:
      save in interface IControllerForDao
      Specified by:
      save in interface IControllerForEng
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity to be saved.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to be saved.
      Returns:
      The entity that was saved.

    • update

      public void update(int simulationID, int orderID, double completionTime)
      Updates the simulation and order information when a new order is completed. 1. Updates the order completion time and processing time. 2. Updates the simulation by increasing the number of packages processed and updating the average time. 3. Updates the UI by setting the average time. 4. Updates the order and simulation in the database.
      Specified by:
      update in interface IControllerForDao
      Specified by:
      update in interface IControllerForEng
      Parameters:
      simulationID - The id of the simulation.
      orderID - The id of the order.
      completionTime - The completion time of the order.

    • find

      public <T> T find(Class<T> type, int id)
      Finds an entity from the database by its id. 1. If the type is Simulation, finds a simulation from the database by its id. 2. If the type is Order, finds an order from the database by its id.
      Specified by:
      find in interface IControllerForDao
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity to be returned.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the entity to be returned.
      id - The id of the entity to be returned.
      Returns:
      The entity from the database.

    • findAll

      public <T> List<T> findAll(Class<T> type)
      Returns all the simulations or orders from the database. 1. If the type is Simulation, returns all the simulations from the database. 2. If the type is Order, returns all the orders from the database.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface IControllerForDao
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the entity to be returned.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the entity to be returned.
      Returns:
      A list of all the simulations or orders from the database.
